results.description: Australia off-spinner Nathan Lyon will join Hampshire as an overseas County Championship signing in 2020.
results.shortTitle: Hampshire sign Lyon as overseas player
results.title: Nathan Lyon: Hampshire sign Australia off-spinner as overseas player

results.description: Hampshire wicketkeeper Lewis McManus signs a contract extension until at least 2020.
results.shortTitle: Hampshire keeper McManus signs new deal
results.title: Lewis McManus: Hampshire wicketkeeper signs contract extension until 2020

thumbnail.altText: Lewis McManus played in seven of Hampshire's County Championship matches lat season, sharing wicketkeeping duties with Tom Alsop

results.description: Hampshire all-rounder Brad Taylor signs a new deal to keep him with the county until the end of the 2021 season.
results.shortTitle: Hants all-rounder Taylor signs new deal
results.title: Brad Taylor: Hampshire all-rounder signs new deal until end of 2021

results.title: County ins & outs - signings, departures and rumours

thumbnail.altText: Miguel Cummins has ended his West Indies career to join Middlesex as a Kolpak player

results.description: Hampshire are confident they can bring Australia off-spinner Nathan Lyon in as their overseas player next season.
results.shortTitle: Hampshire confident of Lyon signing for 2020
results.title: Nathan Lyon: Hampshire confident of signing Australia spinner for 2020 season

results.description: Kent and Hampshire draw their final match of the County Championship season as play is abandoned on the last day.
results.shortTitle: Kent and Hants end with a rain-hit draw
results.title: County Championship: Kent v Hampshire abandoned because of rain

results.description: Hampshire seamer Kyle Abbott signs a new three-year deal, a week after registering the fourth best bowling figures in County Championship history.
results.shortTitle: Hampshire bowler Abbott extends deal
results.title: Kyle Abbott: Hampshire seamer signs new three-year deal

results.description: Rain and sodden outfields causes major disruption in the County Championship once again on Wednesday.

results.description: Heavy rain badly affects Tuesday's County Championship, with four games abandoned without a ball bowled.
results.shortTitle: Rain affects second day of Championship
results.title: County Championship: No play possible in four games on Tuesday
